oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various record and radio excerpts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various recordings of performances featuring various performers, mostly pertaining to the Sons Of The Pioneers and Texas Troubadours and other unidentified performers.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sons Of The Pioneers; Texas Troubadours; Hugh Farr; Duke Of Paducah
